summary: This mod adds a standalone Nord follower based on my own character.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9760694181/[/img]
\\\"The name\\\'s Luna, named after the butterfly Luna Moth, my mother\\\'s favorite alchemy ingredient. I\\\'m obviously talking about their wings. People call me \\\"Luna the Raider\\\". Why you ask? Everybody, except the guards and the Jarls, knows that I always steal something precious at a Jarl\\\'s Longhouse, as well as tons of other things around the cities, especially at rich people\\\'s house, like the Black-Briar\\\'s. But all I want is to share my adventures with somebody who\\\'s like me. Not a thief, an adventurer. Oh but if this person is a thief as well, I\\\'d be glad to share my knowledge with him/her.\\\"

[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9761062743/[/img]
The Frozen Hearth, Winterhold

[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9760783141/[/img]
[color=grey][b] NONE! [/b] [/color]

[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9760990865/[/img]
Installation (manual):
[list=1]
[*]Put \\\"LunaTheRaider.esp\\\" in your data folder
[*]Put the \\\"Luna\\\" folder from the \\\"meshes\\\" folder to your \\\"meshes\\\" folder following this way: meshes\\\\actors\\\\characters
[*]Do the same as the 2nd step but in your \\\"textures\\\" folder
[/list]

Uninstallation (manual): 
[list=1]
[*]Delete \\\"LunaTheRaider.esp\\\" from your data folder
[*]Delete the \\\"Luna\\\" folder from the \\\"meshes\\\" folder following this way: meshes\\\\actors\\\\characters
[*]Do the same as the 2nd step but in your \\\"textures\\\" folder
[/list]

[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9760992515/[/img]
[list]
[*]Install this mod using the Nexus Mod Manager if you\\\'re not familiar with manual installations
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34346//?]Smile in HD[/url] by zzjay
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33117//?]Realistic Teeth[/url] by Anton0028 and Brumbek
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4502//?]Better Freckles[/url] by Madcat221[/size]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783//?]HN66s Long Eye Lashes[/url] by humannature66
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784//?]High Resolution Scars[/url] by Xenius
[/list]

[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9760987724/[/img]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35327//?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by hellosanta
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13076//?]Cute Eyes[/url] by tktk1
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//??]RaceMenu[/url] by Expired
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951//?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE Team
[*]hair by hellosanta
[*]Big thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951//?]Natilde[/url] for her amazing [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25673//?]tutorial[/url]
[/list]

[img]http://www.flickr.com/photos/101839874@N05/9760988374/[/img]
[list]
[*]Custom voice
[*]Custom armor
[/list]

This is my first mod, so please if you like it, don\\\'t hesitate to Endorse and Comment. If you don\\\'t, well too bad :) Enjoy!
author: Sally
